title: BS.Player PRO 2.58 Build 1058 Final Portable
description:
BS.Player PRO 2.58 Build 1058 Final Multilanguage Portable | 10.3 MB

BS.Player - the best multimedia player (DivX, HD and AVC video, movie, audio, DVD, YouTube) in the world! Ever since the very beginning in the year 2000, the BS.PlayerÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ has been one of the world\'s most popular multimedia players. It is popular for many reasons, one however should be pointed out: BS.PlayerÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ is the first player ever to enable its users to focus on watching the movie instead of dealing with poor computer capabilities or running around looking for a proper setting and codec.

BS.Player ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ is used by more than 70 millions of multi media users throughout the world and it has been translated into more than 90 world languages. All downloaded versions of our FREE version exceed the sum of all downloads of competitive media players and payable DivX or DVD players. Because it does not use much of the CPU processing resources for multimedia playback it is suitable for all those who use slightly less capable computers.

Now, you can finally enjoy the playback of HD DVD and AVCHD movies of the highest quality with minimal system requirements. BS.Player can playback any YouTube movie directly from the internet and save it to local disk.

Most importantly, BS.Player ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢, a free media movie player, is a product for the world multi media market and is therefore equipped with advanced subtitle options which enable the users to watch video content with subtitles from many popular subtitle formats (MicroDVD .sub, VobSub .sub + .idx, SubViewer .sub, (advanced) SubStation Alpha .ssa or .ass, SubRip .srt, VPlayer .txt...). BS.Player is also a AVCHD player and enables you to display AVCHD video format movies (advanced Video Codec High Definition) used in digital tapeless camcorders. It can automatically search and download missing subtitles for currently playing video, if available.

BS.Player ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ is the software movie and media player that supports all popular video and audio media file types, containers and formats such as: DivX, Xvid, avi, mpg, mpeg-1, mpeg-2, mpeg-4, 3ivx, YouTube streaming video, AVC HD (avchd player), QT QuickTime mov, RM Real media, OGM, Matroska , mkv, asf, wmv, DV, m1v, m2v, mp4, mpv, swf, vob and wav, mpa, mp1, mp2, mp3, Ogg, aac, DTS, Dolby Surround, Dolby digital DD 5.1 - AC3, aif, ram, wma, flv (Flash and YouTube Video) and much more!

Main features of BS.Player are:
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Sound Equalizer
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fully skinnable windows (Media list, Play list, Equalizer)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Bookmarks support (add, edit)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Chapters support (create, move to, skip)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Custom aspect ratios
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Multiple audio stream switching
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Frame capture (video to picture)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Plugin support (Winamp DSP plugins and others)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Multilingual interface
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fast forward and fast rewind option
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Frame stepping (playback video one frame at a time)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ WinLIRC support (user defineable remote controllers)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Support switching between multiple (different language) subtitles
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Pan-scan and custom pan-scan option
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Support for multiple audio streams and switching between them
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Every action can also be assigned to WinLIRC button
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Playback of incomplete AVI files and locked files (files in use, files still downloading or recording)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Command line support (for example \"bsplayer.exe movie.avi -fs\" will start playback of movie in full screen mode)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Support a lot of subtitles formats (MicroDVD, SubRip, Subviewer...), custom subtitles position, color, font, transparency...
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ BSI/INI files support and dynamic DirectShow filters loading (so everything can be burned on CD and played without installing anything)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Almost every action can be assigned to user selected key (even two keys) and different keys can be assigned for full screen and windowed mode
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Support for all popular media formats (audio and video): divx, avi, mpeg 1, mpeg 2, xvid, 3ivx, ogm, matroska, asf, wmv, DV, m1v, m2v, Quicktime mov, mp4, mpv, QT, Real rm, SWF, vob, wav, mpa, mp1, mp2, mp3, ogg, aac, ac3, aif, ram, wma...

What\'s new in version 2.58 Build 1058

[FIXES]
- dvd playback with some DVDs
- file association bug
- display problem with some Unicode file names
- problem with online subtitles, sometimes even if existed it wasn\'t displayed
- YouTube video playback stream
- when opening some media files there were a lot of 1 byte reads
- some languages didn\'t get properly set at installation
- new subtitle renderer should now handle RTL languages properly

[ADDITIONS]
- alternate AC3/DTS audio decoder
- frame step now also works with EVR video renderer
- some plugin events for playlist handling
- support for madVR - Video renderer
- Taskbar Progress Bar is now \'normal\' for streams
- edit bookmark window is now non-modal
- online subtitle result window also non-modal
- some other bug fixes and security enhancements

Home Page - http://www.bsplayer.org/
